# ConnectTaggingKitAddin.OnDisconnection method

handle disconnection of the OneNote application.

```csharp
public void OnDisconnection(ext_DisconnectMode RemoveMode, ref Array custom)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| RemoveMode | Enumeration value that informs an add-in why it was unloaded |
| custom | An empty array that you can use to pass host-specific data for use after the add-in unloads. |
